description:
11.44 convolution
Apply convolution of 3x3, 5x5, 7x7 or horizontal/vertical up to 49 elements.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: convolution

parameters.description: Set matrix for each plane. Matrix is sequence of 9, 25 or 49 signed integers in square mode, and from 1 to 49 odd number of signed integers in row mode.

parameters.name: 3m

parameters.description: Set multiplier for calculated value for each plane. If unset or 0, it will be sum of all matrix elements.
